alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 9:18PM PDT until April 04 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PDT TUESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 2 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slick and snow covered roadways possible on Highway 93 north of Caliente. Panaca Summit on Highway 319 could also see significant impacts.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
